response.overview: Our first short film exploring the theme of cancer prevention through the experiences of three strong characters and their loved ones. Loving mum and nan, Val, stubborn cabbie Charlie, and salt of the earth husband and dad, Big John all respond differently and face their own personal challenges as the film weaves their lives together. Written, Produced & Directed by Clare Brumby. Commissioned by Cheshire & Merseyside Cancer Alliance/One Knowsley
response.title: First Signs
